div.p: Huron Academy does not maintain the websites linked from our pages. We cannot be responsible for content on pages outside our school website. Sites are selected carefully for elementary/middle student use, but cannot be guaranteed. Please keep in mind that adult supervision is encouraged when students are exploring the Internet.

div.a: Adding Photos/Video into Google Classroom Assignments

a.class: lts_button lts_button_sc lts_button_medium lt_rounded lt_circular It_flat

div.p: Please use the following form to contact us regarding COVID-19 Remote Learning at Huron Academy.

form.noscript: Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form.

input.name: wpforms

div.p: *Huron Academy does not maintain the websites linked from our pages. We cannot be responsible for content on pages outside our school website. Sites are selected carefully for elementary/middle student use, but cannot be guaranteed. Please keep in mind that adult supervision is encouraged when students are exploring the Internet.

Please email the webmaster of Huron Academy if you discover any broken links, sites that no longer exist, or have changed dramatically from the intended content. Include the district URL address of the page and a brief statement about your question or comment in the email and we will review your message.
Address: 11401 Metropolitan Parkway, Sterling Heights, MI. 48312
Copyright © 2018 Huron Academy | All Rights Reserved
